ComicInfo.Summary:
There can be only one... only one all-new, action-packed, monthly comic book series starring the Immortal Highlander!
Edge of Life continues as Duncan MacLeod attempts to free his cousin Connor from the effects of a Dark Quickening and the growing influence of the Kurgan's black soul! Plus: More action set in the past as we explore the origins of the immortal Byrne in feudal Japan!
Also, this month, look for special covers from Michael Avon Oeming, Pat Lee, Dave Dorman and David Michael Beck!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Michael Avon Oeming (a) & Nick Filardi (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | David Michael Beck | 5 | C | Cover C | Dave Dorman | 3 | D | Cover D | Pat Lee | 4 | RI | Retailer Incentive - Black-and-White Sketch Cover | David Michael Beck | Missing |
